permissions.description: Zombie free command for admins to run the command for their personal house
Resets player drone data to place a new one
Visit the map to unlock for Takaro and CPM
Set the location of your jail
Commands for staff to use without using Currency

versions.configSchema: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#","type":"object","required":["userDiscordChannel"],"additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"userDiscordChannel":{"title":"userDiscordChannel","description":"Sends to discord","default":"","type":"string"},"droneReplacement":{"title":"Items","description":"Gives a drone and some extra mods","x-component":"item","type":"array","uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"object","title":"Item","properties":{"item":{"type":"string","title":"Item"},"amount":{"type":"number","title":"Amount"},"quality":{"type":"string","title":"Quality"}}}},"moduleLookUp":{"title":"moduleLookUp","description":"Uuid of the staff command module","default":"","type":"string"},"adminCommandDiscord":{"title":"adminCommandDiscord","description":"Discord Channel Id of admin commands","default":"1396394567611318293","type":"string"}}}

commands.name: restoreL
commands.description: Change a players level
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (level)[-] - Sets players level

commands.name: killall
commands.description: Kill all of the Zeds on the server.
commands.helpText: Kill all of the Zeds on the server.

commands.name: th - 2
commands.description: Second round of Targeted Horde
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] Send a horde in 4 intervals in 30 seconds at a player.

commands.name: th - 4
commands.description: Fourth round of Targeted Horde
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] Send a horde in 4 intervals in 30 seconds at a player.

commands.name: kickall
commands.description: Kicks everyone
commands.helpText: Kicks all of the players off of the server

commands.name: th - 3
commands.description: Third round of Targeted Horde
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] Send a horde in 4 intervals in 30 seconds at a player.

commands.name: visitmap
commands.description: Open the map for Takaro and CPM
commands.helpText: Open the map for Takaro and CPM.

commands.name: rpd
commands.description: Resets a player's data. When there's no saving the data of a player. Use this as the last resort! You must confirm the reset by running it twice.
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Resets a player back to day 1

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: the player's data you are resetting

commands.name: pull
commands.description: pull (name) - Pull a player to you. Use if /get isn't working
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Pull a player to you. Use if /get isn't working

commands.name: rdd
commands.description: Reset drone data for a player
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - fixes max drones deployed. Kicks Player

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: Person drone data is being reset for

commands.name: pr
commands.description: Resets the POI you're standing in
commands.helpText: Reset the POI you are standing in

commands.name: unmute
commands.description: Moderator command to unmute players in game chats
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Unmute player

commands.name: am
commands.description: Admin menu with creative menu and debugmode
commands.helpText: Creative mode and debug menu. Reserved for admins. Excessive use will remove the ability to use it.

commands.name: arrest
commands.description: Arrest an unruly player
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (reason)[-]

commands.name: replace
commands.description: replaces a players drone
commands.helpText: Gives a patreon drone and 8 cargo mos

commands.name: avisit
commands.description: Visit a player without using currency.
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Lets you visit a player bypassing needing to be friends and does NOT use Twinkies

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Ban players for 1 year
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (reason)[-]

arguments.name: reasoning
arguments.defaultValue: contact a moderator for the reason

commands.name: buff - 1
commands.description: Buff a player that's dieing a lot for 2 minutes.
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Gives the player god mode for a few minutes

commands.name: buff - 2
commands.description: Automaticcally removes buff. no need to worry about this.
commands.helpText: Ends players buff

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Moderator command to kick players
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (reason in quotes)[-]

arguments.name: reasoning
arguments.defaultValue: Contact a moderator for a kick reason

commands.name: kill
commands.description: Kill a player
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Will kill the player. must be ran twice to be confirmed.

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: The player you want to kill

commands.name: mute
commands.description: [70FE02](name)[-] - Moderator command to mute players
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) "(reason)"[-]

commands.name: ocn
commands.description: Change a player's name in chat. Type /ocn (Name) (New Name). Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (new name)[-] - Change a player's name in chat.

commands.name: release
commands.description: Release a player from jail
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - releases from jail

commands.name: restoreS
commands.description: Type restoreS (name) (skill points). Have them spend their points
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (amount)[-] - sets a players skilll points to the amount

commands.name: restart
commands.description: Shut down the server with a timer. Type/ shutdownba (number of minutes) Example: /shutdownba 10
commands.helpText: [70FE02](minutes)[-] - starts a server restart.

commands.name: brender
commands.description: Spawns a building
commands.helpText: [70FE02](programmed name of poi) (rotation) (height)[-] - only works in the console (f1 menu)/ Do not fly. use blocks to mark position. [02FEDC]bundo[-] to undo.

commands.name: llp
commands.description: Lists closest land claim to your position
commands.helpText: Lists closest land claim to your position

commands.name: removeLCB
commands.description: Removes the Land Claim block closest to your position.
commands.helpText: Removes the Land Claim Block closest to your position

commands.name: bundo
commands.description: Un does brender
commands.helpText: Only works in the console (f1 menu). Un does brender

commands.name: rvr
commands.description: [70FE02](name)[-] - Reset vending machine rental for a player.
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Resets a vending rental for a player.

commands.name: setwaypointpublic
commands.description: Public waypoint setter
commands.helpText: [70FE02](waypoint name)[-] - sets a waypoint public

commands.name: wi
commands.description: Wipe a player's belt, bag of all
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) <[bag] [belt] [equipment] [all]>[-] - wipes inventory of chosen option. Bag = inventory

commands.name: th - 1
commands.description: Reset vending machine rental for a player.
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] Send a horde in 4 intervals in 30 seconds at a player.

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: person you're sending the horde after

commands.name: abed
commands.description: Teleports admin to a players bed roll
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name)[-] - Teleports an admin to a players bed roll. Player must be online

commands.name: admin
commands.description: List of commands and help for the admin.
commands.helpText: A list of admin help commands for admins. [70FE02](name of command)[-] for help with a specific command

commands.name: setjail
commands.description: Set an 11x11 area to put your jail birds in.
commands.helpText: Set an 11x11 area to put jail birds in.

commands.name: zomb
commands.description: Admins can set their own person zombie free zone.
commands.helpText: Stand directly above your land claim when you run this command!

commands.name: revokecurrency
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (amount)[-]

arguments.name: receiver
arguments.helpText: The player to revoke currency from

arguments.name: amount
arguments.helpText: The amount of currency to revoke

commands.name: revoke
commands.description: Removes currency from the player
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (amount)[-]

commands.name: addcurrency
commands.description: Adds currency to the player
commands.helpText: [70FE02](name) (amount)[-]
